name: Ghoster! (Carebear)
description: Help Ghoster save his cat, Catsper, from the evil witch! Travel through 9 worlds and 48 different levels to defeat the witch once and for all. Use coloured spikes and shields to solve puzzles. Discover multiple colours, reappearing spikes, switches, keys and doors, and spoOoOoky dark levels! Make your own levels with the built-in level editor. Save your progress in-game, and listen to unique music. Use the arrow keys to move, Enter to select, and Control to go back.
